handleCommand

public void handleCommand(android.content.Intent intent,
                          int startId)
The PlayStoreBillingReceiver sends messages to this service using intents. Each intent has an action and some extra arguments specific to that action.

Parameters:
intent - the intent containing one of the supported actions
startId - an identifier for the invocation instance of this service

checkBillingSupported

public boolean checkBillingSupported()
Checks if in-app billing is supported.

Returns:
true if supported; false otherwise

requestPurchase

public boolean requestPurchase(java.lang.String productId,
                               java.lang.String developerPayload)
Requests that the given item be offered to the user for purchase. When the purchase succeeds (or is canceled) the PlayStoreBillingReceiver receives an intent with the action BillingConstants.ACTION_NOTIFY. Returns false if there was an error trying to connect to Android Market.

Parameters:
productId - an identifier for the item being offered for purchase
developerPayload - a payload that is associated with a given purchase, if null, no payload is sent
Returns:
false if there was an error connecting to Android Market

restoreTransactions

public boolean restoreTransactions()
Requests transaction information for all managed items. Call this only when the application is first installed or after a database wipe. Do NOT call this every time the application starts up.

Returns:
false if there was an error connecting to Android Market

onServiceConnected

public void onServiceConnected(android.content.ComponentName name,
                               android.os.IBinder service)
This is called when we are connected to the MarketBillingService. This runs in the main UI thread.

Specified by:
onServiceConnected in interface android.content.ServiceConnection

onServiceDisconnected

public void onServiceDisconnected(android.content.ComponentName name)
This is called when we are disconnected from the MarketBillingService.

Specified by:
onServiceDisconnected in interface android.content.ServiceConnection

public void unbind()
